<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Sea Devil Brute](/Monsters.aspx?ID=359)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Physically imposing sea devils are equipped with some of the best weaponry the community can find, though most are happy to rend their foes using tooth and nail.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Sea Devil Brute](/Monsters.aspx?ID=359)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Amphibious" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=207" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Sea Devil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=235" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 287</row>

**Perception** +7; darkvision, wavesense 30 feet

**Languages**
[Aquan](/Languages.aspx?ID=14); shark commune 150 feet

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +9, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +1

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Shark Commune** ([mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [telepathy](/Traits.aspx?ID=250)) The sea devil can communicate telepathically with sharks within range. It can communicate only simple concepts like “come,” “guard,” or “attack.”

**Items**
[Trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 60

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, swim 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
trident +14,
**Damage** 1d8+8 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d6+6 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +14,
**Damage** 1d8+6 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
trident +11 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d8+8 piercing

**Blood Frenzy** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Rage](/Traits.aspx?ID=135)) **Requirements** The sea devil is not [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) or already in a frenzy. **Trigger** The sea devil deals bleed damage to a living creature. **Effect** The sea devil flies into a frenzy that lasts 1 minute. While frenzied, the sea devil gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with its claws and jaws, gains a +4 status bonus to damage rolls with its claws and jaws, gains 11 temporary HP until the end of the frenzy, and takes a -2 status penalty to AC. The sea devil can’t voluntarily stop its frenzy. After its frenzy, the sea devil is [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15).

**Bloodletting**   When the sea devil deals piercing or slashing damage, it also deals 1d4 persistent bleed damage if the target was [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) or if the attack was a critical hit.

**Unimpeded Throw**   A sea devil brute can use thrown ranged weapons underwater with no penalty due to range increment.

</column>
